title: Who cares?
brief_description: A personal impression of what happened to the people of the Abercrombie district of Liverpool when they were transplanted en bloc to the monstrosity of suburban, high rise planning. The residents regret the almost overnight obliteration of their old community and resent the unwelcome isolation of their new bewilderment.
